OOC: It's not a pod, it's a shuttle.

Azure looked at the two bots. He quickly read their sparks to be
predacons, but he wondered who they were and whom they served, so he
tried to wait and listen for new informations.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> "It's a dang shame that there ain't no one to slag out here." 
> Quickstrike complained.
> 
> "Every job from the royalty is a gift!" Inferno insisted.
> 
> They landed on the cliff near the pob.
> 
> "Ah! Now we can bring this new subject to the queen and the colony 
> shall grow!"  Inferno said as they moved in on the pod.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
> > Azure looked around. Sea, sand, tall rocks and taller cliffs... Not
> > exactly a paradise vacation, but it would have to do. Perhaps he 
> would
> > be able to refine some iron and enough silicon within a few 
> decades so
> > he could repair the shuttle and join his group, but by then, his
> > mission won't be as necessary as it now was.
> > 
> > Just then, he smelled it. Metal, circuits, spark signatures. Where 
> did
> > he land?
> > 
> > He transformed into a sleek and light dragon of an ice-cold blue, 
> and
> > he took flight up to a towering cliff. Who exactly was coming 
> along?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > "Yes my queen."  Inferno replied obediently.  He and Quickstrike
> > > proceeded to exit the base.  Quickstrike reverted to his beast 
> mode
> > > and Inferno picked him up and flew to the origin of the signal.
> > > 
> > > (OOC: Should these two arrive first or not?)
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Kup:
> > > > 
> > > > Kup picked up the distress signal and he opened the com link to
> > > Rattrap and Optimus Primal "Hey lads, I'm pickin up a signal it 
> seems
> > > that someone need helps"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Hydras:
> > > > 
> > > > In other side, In predacon base Hydras pickled up the signal 
> too,
> > > looking too Quickstrike and Infenrto told them "It seems that 
> someone
> > > has arrived here... go to invite him to visit us but if it's a 
> Maxi or
> > > they are around don't fight, we can't annoy them while we need 
> them to
> > > defeat Unnicron"
